channel.title: Strange question about banks
channel.description:
Alright say you filed bankruptcy on a vehicle, and the bank does not claim that vehicle after like 2+ years. Is there any way of having the bank come get that vehicle and pay you for the time that vehicle sat there on your property? Or better yet claim the vehicle back?
Also on the note, filing bankruptcy does not make you poor. To many debts, vacations, and what not..
